title: Крикет и Данди
overview: Mr. Donald has given Cricket and Dundee a serious task to exchange 2 million rubles for the repair of two establishments. However, the bandits kill the boss's colleague and take the money for themselves, leaving Cricket and Dundee with nothing. As soon as Mr. Donald learns about this incident, he orders the two to return his money. Later, they must save their hometown of Kleverovo from a terrible danger. Join them now!
